subject: Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Horse Racing
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: The devices, also called batteries or machines, conduct electrical current to shock a racehorse into running faster and have long been part of the sport’s seamier lore.
